publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1941 Mr Jim Wallace: Convention Rights (Compliance) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Convention Rights (Compliance) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Iain Gray*
